description:
# Want to try Ethereum 2.0 on DAppNode?

Great! That's probably why you are here.

Keep in mind: this is a highly experimental test network with no uptime guarantees.

The Prysm team gladly offer support in their Discord channel, through Github issues, their Gitter channel, and Twitter @prylabs.

Keep in mind that this is only a proof of concept about having an Eth2.0 validator running on DAppNode based on the work of Prysmatic labs.

validator_account.title: Validator account
validator_account.description:
Do you want to use a new (or the current) validator keypair or do you want to import an already registered validator account?

* **New/current**: An account will be created only if there is no account in the system

* **Import**: You can import a validator account that you have already registered as a validator
